c1.name: Ascetics of Frost
c1.effect: When the Herald of Frost hits an enemy marked by a Fortune-Preserving Talisman, Qiqi regenerates 2 energy.

c2.name: Frozen to the Bone
c2.effect: Qiqi's Normal and Charge Attack DMG against enemies affected by Cryo is increased by 15%.

c3.name: Ascendant Praise
c3.effect: Increase the Level of Adeptus Art: Preserver of Fortune by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Divine Suppression
c4.effect: Targets marked by the Fortune-Preserving Talisman have their ATK decreased by 20%.

c5.name: Crimson Lotus Bloom
c5.effect: Increases the Level of Adeptus Art: Herald of Frost by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Rite of Resurrection
c6.effect: Using Adeptus Art: Preserver of Fortune revives all nearby fallen party members and regenerates 50% of their HP. Can only occur once every 15 mins.
